attributes.action: provide funds for the building of a statue or monument in Gorton, Manchester to comemerate Edward Beef
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Edward Beef was a much loved member of the community in Gorton, Manchester. He was sadly killed in a sailing accident when out at sea with 2 friends. He was a muched loved member of the community, he ran the boys brigade and was always involved in charity activies. A statue or monument would be a fitting tribute to a truly great man. I am certain that lots of people within the community would take the time out to sign this petition.
